topic.title: 2.2.4 Piping and Wiring Connection of Mist Collector

header.para: Piping and Wiring Connection of Mist Collector

para.text: Mist Collector are options. If available, connect the piping and wiring from the machine to the Mist Collector as shown in

li.text: When the piping and wiring have been completed, place the Mist Collector following the layout and then lock the casters beneath the stand.
Be careful that the piping, hoses and cables on the machine side are not subjected to pressure.

image.src: Mist Collector on STD MC Piping_Wiring.png
Mist Collector on STD MC Piping_Wiring_2.png

para.text: <%HMFIGURECOUNTER3=2%>.<%HMFIGURECOUNTER%> Mist Collector (Option) on Standard Machine Piping/Wiring
